rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {FIT2093} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit provides a broad coverage of digital ICT forensics. Students will examine definitions of evidence as they apply to investigations involving the seizure and examination of information technology devices. The unit will introduce students to various tools, techniques and algorithms that may be employed by investigators for acquisition, preservation and analysis of evidence. Disk-based (local) and network (remote) forensic environments will be explored. Students will also learn of the impediments and complicating factors that can threaten forensic investigations.
